Package me.dnorris.pool.data.hitbox

Interface Hitbox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLocationHitbox, CircleLocationHitbox, EmptyHitbox, HollowRectangleLocationHitbox, RectangleLocationHitbox
    public interface Hitbox
    Hitbox interface for determining what entities have what physical space

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        Each Hitbox type will have a priority which determines which Hitbox should handle the collision. Therefore, higher priority Hitboxs will handle the collisions.
        Returns:
        The priority of the hitbox

      • getCenter

        Location getCenter()
        Center Location of the Hitbox
        Returns:
        The center of the Hitbox

      • setCenter

        void setCenter​(Location location)
        Sets the center Location of the Hitbox
        Parameters:
        location - New center point

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation​(Hitbox other)
        Get collision point
        Parameters:
        other - Other Hitbox
        Returns:
        point of collision between the two

      • getDimensions

        java.awt.Dimension getDimensions()
        The height and width of the Hitbox
        Returns:
        The Dimension for the Hitbox

      • isImmovable

        boolean isImmovable()
        Determines if the Hitbox can be moved
        Returns:
        If the Hitbox is move-able

      • setImmovable

        void setImmovable​(boolean immovable)
        Update if the Hitbox is move-able
        Parameters:
        immovable - Can the Hitbox be moved

      • isInteractable

        boolean isInteractable()
        Determines if the Hitbox can be interacted with by other Hitbox
        Returns:
        If the Hitbox can be hit

      • setInteractable

        void setInteractable​(boolean interactable)
        Update if the Hitbox can be interacted with by other Hitbox
        Parameters:
        interactable - Can the Hitbox be hit

      • isColliding

        boolean isColliding​(Hitbox other)
        Determine if the two Hitbox are interacting with eachother
        Parameters:
        other - The other Hitbox being checked
        Returns:
        If the two Hitbox have collided with eachother

      • clone

        Hitbox clone()
        Creates a direct copy of the object
        Returns:
        New version of the Hitbox
